title: The Equations of Motion
text: Use the formula: s=u*t+1/2*​a*t**2, where s is the distance, u is the initial velocity, a is the acceleration $$(-9.8$$ $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$ in this case), and $$t$$ is the time.

title: Height Calculation
text: Substitute the given values into the formula s=u*t+1/2*​a*t**2 to find the height (s).
